headline: A Pasta You’ll Want, Shallots and All
abstract: Let’s be clear: Alison Roman doesn’t take requests. But sometimes, there are exceptions.
lead_paragraph: As a general rule, I don’t take requests for recipes — not at home when I’m cooking for others, and not for this column. Sure, the temptation to give people exactly what they want is always there, but ultimately I’m not certain that does anyone any favors. If I just wrote recipes by request, this would be a column of strictly chickpea stews and sheet-pan chicken (not that there’s anything wrong with that!). I’m sorry if that sounds harsh.
